item.title: Truck Wiring and Lighting - Part I
item.description: As mentioned in my Custom Truck Console post, since my truck was stolen and now recovered (with all of the emergency equipment stripped out - weird) I’ve got to start from scratch. Since I finished the console, I’ve started work on redoing the lighting. The first grueling step was …

item.title: Custom truck console
item.description: Updated December 26, 2021: This seems rather unbelievable almost thirteen years to the day after I started construction of this console… but I was just cleaning out a box of old paperwork of mine in my parents’ garage, and found the original dimensioned drawing for this project.
